explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses integrating uncertainty quantification methods for supervised learning into optimization problems, indicating the use of machine learning techniques.
explanations.supervised learning: The abstract explicitly mentions integrating uncertainty quantification (UQ) methods for supervised learning into the ambiguity sets for distributionally robust optimization (DRO).
explanations.deep learning: The paper uses deep ensembles (DEs) as one of the approaches for uncertainty quantification, which is a deep learning technique.
explanations.neural network: Deep ensembles (DEs) and Monte Carlo dropout are mentioned, both of which are related to neural networks.
explanations.dropout regularization: The paper mentions using Monte Carlo dropout as one of the methods for sampling, which is a form of dropout regularization in neural networks.
